holidays.name: Martin Luther King Jr. Day
holidays.description: King was the chief spokesperson for nonviolent activism in the Civil Rights Movement, which successfully protested racial discrimination in federal and state law.

holidays.name: International Women's Day
holidays.description: It is a focal point in the movement for women's rights.

holidays.name: Juneteenth
holidays.description: Juneteenth is celebrating the emancipation of those who had been enslaved in the United States.

holidays.name: International Equal Pay Day
holidays.description: Represents the longstanding efforts towards the achievement of equal pay for work of equal value. It further builds on the United Nations commitment to human rights and against all forms of discrimination.

holidays.name: Day of Persons with Disabilities
holidays.description: The annual observance of the International Day of Disabled Persons was proclaimed in 1992 by United Nations General Assembly resolution 47/3. It aims to promote the rights and well-being of persons with disabilities in all spheres of society and development, and to increase awareness of the situation of persons with disabilities in every aspect of political, social, economic and cultural life.

holidays.name: Black History Month
holidays.description: Black History Month is an annual observance originating in the United States, where it is also known as African-American History Month.

holidays.name: Women's History Month
holidays.description: Commemorating and encouraging the study, observance and celebration of the vital role of women in history. Features the 8th of March as an Internartional Women's Day

holidays.name: PRIDE month
holidays.description: Gay pride or LGBT pride is the promotion of the self-affirmation, dignity, equality, and increased visibility of lesbian, gay, bisexual, and transgender (LGBT) people as a social group. Pride, as opposed to shame and social stigma, is the predominant outlook that bolsters most LGBT rights movements.

holidays.name: Global Diversity Awareness Month
holidays.description: Pays tribute to the diverse minds and beliefs held by all cultures around the world.
